FilePathRule.Name: Allows administrators to execute all DLLs
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to load all DLLs.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow everyone to execute all DLLs located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to load DLLs located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow everyone to execute all DLLs located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to load DLLs that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow administrators to run all Windows Installer files
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all Windows Installer files.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow everyone to run all Windows Installer files located in the Windows\Installer folder.
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run all Windows Installer files located in %systemdrive%\Windows\Installer.

FilePathRule.Name: All scripts
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all scripts.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow everyone to run all scripts located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: Allow everyone to run all scripts located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Windows folder.

FilePublisherRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run packaged apps that are signed.
FilePublisherRule.Name: (Default Rule) All signed packaged apps
